hero.title: Well Planned Commercial Shops for Rent in Sector 78 Faridabad
description: Sector 78 Faridabad is a developing residential and commercial locality in Greater Faridabad that is steadily gaining attention from business owners. People searching for a shop for rent in Sector 78 Faridabad prefer this area due to its organised sector planning, wide roads, and proximity to nearby residential sectors like Sector 75, Sector 76, and Sector 79. The locality is witnessing continuous residential occupancy, which creates a growing demand for neighbourhood retail and service-based businesses.

Shops for rent in Sector 78 Faridabad are suitable for grocery stores, medical shops, salons, cafes, coaching centres, and daily-need outlets. Compared to central Faridabad, rental values here remain affordable while offering strong future growth prospects. Renting a shop in Sector 78 allows business owners to establish early presence in a growing market, build long-term customer relationships, and benefit from increasing footfall driven by residential expansion.

featuresSection.heading: Commercial Shop Size Options Available in Sector 78 Faridabad
description: Choosing the right shop size is important for business operations, visibility, and customer convenience.
Sector 78 Faridabad offers multiple plot-based shop options to suit different business needs and budgets.

features.title: 4 Marla Plot Based Shops for Rent
features.description: 4 Marla shops in Sector 78 Faridabad are ideal for small retail outlets, salons, mobile shops, and service centres. These shops are affordable and easy to manage, making them suitable for startups and local businesses targeting nearby residential footfall.

features.title: 6 Marla Plot Based Shops for Rent
features.description: 6 Marla shops provide better frontage and usable space, making them suitable for pharmacies, bakeries, and convenience stores. Renting a 6 Marla shop in Sector 78 Faridabad offers a balance between rental affordability and improved customer visibility.

features.title: 8 Marla Plot Based Shops for Rent
features.description: 8 Marla shops are suitable for cafes, coaching institutes, boutiques, and mid-sized retail outlets. These shops allow flexible interior layouts, seating arrangements, and storage space to support moderate customer flow.

features.title: 10 Marla Plot Based Shops for Rent
features.description: 10 Marla shops are preferred for restaurants, showrooms, and multi-service commercial setups. With wider frontage and better road presence, these shops help businesses build brand awareness in Sector 78 Faridabad.

features.title: 12 Marla Plot Based Shops for Rent
features.description: 12 Marla shops are ideal for clinics, diagnostic centres, professional offices, and premium retail brands. These shops provide ample space for customer comfort and long-term business operations.

features.title: 14 Marla Plot Based Shops for Rent
features.description: 14 Marla shops are designed for anchor businesses that require high visibility, seating capacity, and parking convenience. Large restaurants and flagship outlets benefit from these spacious commercial units.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Shops for Rent in Sector 78
faqSection.description: Detailed answers to common tenant queries to support informed rental decisions.

faqs.question: Is Sector 78 Faridabad a good location to rent a shop?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 78 is a growing residential area with increasing population and steady demand for local businesses.

faqs.question: What types of businesses perform well in Sector 78?
faqs.answer: Grocery stores, medical shops, salons, cafes, coaching centres, and service-based outlets perform well here.

faqs.question: Are shop rents affordable in Sector 78 Faridabad?
faqs.answer: Yes, rents are affordable compared to central Faridabad while offering strong future growth potential.

faqs.question: Which shop size is best for startups?
faqs.answer: 4 Marla and 6 Marla shops are ideal for startups due to lower rental commitments.

faqs.question: Is parking available near rental shops?
faqs.answer: Many commercial areas in Sector 78 offer roadside or nearby parking depending on shop location.

faqs.question: Are lease agreements properly verified?
faqs.answer: Yes, Deal Acres provides assistance with proper lease documentation and verification.

faqs.question: Can I upgrade to a bigger shop later?
faqs.answer: Yes, multiple shop size options in Sector 78 allow businesses to expand easily.

faqs.question: Is Sector 78 suitable for long-term business?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Ongoing residential development supports long-term commercial demand.

faqs.question: How soon can possession be taken?
faqs.answer: Many shops are ready-to-move, allowing quick possession after agreement completion.

faqs.question: How can I find the best shop for rent in Sector 78 Faridabad?
faqs.answer: By sharing your requirements with Deal Acres, you receive verified shop options matched to your needs.
